[Foresight News]

item.title: EigenLayer introduces multi-chain verification on Base, enabling AVS to expand beyond Ethereum L1On July 25, according to The Block, Eigen Labs launched a new feature called "Multi-chain Verification," which is a change in the way active verification services operate in the EigenLayer ecosystem. AVS was previously limited to Ethereum's Layer 1, but can now be deployed to multiple chains, including Layer 2 networks, through an integrated process. This feature has been launched on the Base Sepolia test network, and the main network is expected to be fully open in the third quarter. Through this upgrade, AVS developers can quickly configure smart contract parameters, complete multi-chain deployment within hours, and use the low-cost and high-throughput characteristics of Layer 2 to improve service performance. Eigen Labs also released the EigenCloud platform last month, which integrates core services such as data availability and dispute resolution. [PANews]

item.title: StarkWare CEO: Bitcoin will reach a stage where it is used as currency in the futureStarkWare co-founder Eli Ben-Sasson tweeted, "When people call Bitcoin 'digital gold,' they are referring to its ability to serve as money. On the other hand, it is still a bit clunky. We don't use gold as money today, and similarly, we don't use Bitcoin as a primary means of payment for everyday economic activities today. My prediction is that Bitcoin will reach the stage of being used as money in the future." [Foresight News]

Among them, 3,313 coins (approximately $383.00M) were clearly deposited into the exchange, and USDT continues to be withdrawn from the exchange; the remaining BTC were transferred to new addresses, and the ownership is not yet clear. Currently, Galaxy Digital still holds 26,238 BTC on the chain. [Foresight News]

item.title: Binance: The threshold for claiming LN token airdrop is 200 Alph pointsOn July 25, according to the official announcement, Binance announced that after the Lnfi Network (LN) trading starts, users holding at least 200 Binance Alpha points can apply for 600 LN token airdrops. First come, first served. If the event is not over, the score threshold will automatically decrease by 10 points every hour. Please note that applying for airdrops will consume 15 Binance Alpha points. Users must confirm the application on the Alpha event page within 24 hours, otherwise it will be deemed to have given up the airdrop. [PANews]

item.title: Hubei "Backdoor Coin Swap" Fraud Case Announced: 103 People Defrauded of Over 77.00 Million Yuan in Virtual CurrencyAccording to the Procuratorial Daily, the Yunmeng County Court in Hubei recently issued a final verdict in a virtual currency fraud case. He Mou and 3 others launched a virtual currency platform with a "backdoor," manipulated the price of "D coin," and illegally replaced and transferred users' pledged assets, causing a total loss of approximately 77.76 million yuan to 103 investors within two months. The court sentenced He Mou and others to fixed-term imprisonment ranging from thirteen to three years for fraud, and each was fined between 300,000.00 yuan and 20,000.00 yuan; the second instance ruling rejected the appeal and upheld the original judgment. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Over the past year, Solana added 18.00 million tokens, with nearly 60.00% created by Pumpfun.According to data from @Adam_Tehc, a total of 18.00 million tokens were created on Solana in the past year, of which 10.50 million were created through Pumpfun, accounting for approximately 60% of the Solana network. The number of tokens created on Pumpfun is more than the total of those created on the Base, BSC, Tron, Polygon, Optimism, Blast, Arbitrum, and Ethereum networks combined. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Guolian Shares Approved as Core Member of RWA Ecosystem Partners, Will Participate in the Construction of the RWA Joint LaboratoryAccording to Flush, the Blockchain and Data Element Professional Committee of the China Mobile Communications Federation visited Guolian Shares, and the company was approved as a core member of the RWA ecosystem partners. The two parties focused on three strategic directions: RWA/RDA asset issuance standardization, joint construction of RWA joint laboratories, and the construction of a Hong Kong cross-border digital asset hub, and discussed innovative paths for the integrated development of the digital economy and the real economy. Guolian Shares stated that it will deeply participate in the construction of the RWA joint laboratory, explore and practice in key areas such as standardized issuance and compliant circulation of RWA/RDA assets, and help build a secure and controllable cross-border digital asset circulation system. [Foresight News]

item.title: Voltage CEO: By 2028, Lightning Network may handle at least 5% of global stablecoin transactionsOn July 25, according to Cointelegraph, Graham Krizek, founder and CEO of Voltage, a Lightning Network payment service provider, said in an interview that with the popularity of the Layer 2 network, by 2028, the Lightning Network will handle at least 5% of the world's stablecoin transactions. He said that stablecoins will accelerate the popularity of the Lightning Network because it is the best expansion tool for stablecoins, and the network's stablecoin transactions may reach billions of dollars. At present, there are few stablecoin trading activities on the Lightning Network, but the situation may change soon. "Stablecoins have just entered the Lightning Network, and major participants such as Tether have not yet been launched. The transaction volume accounts for almost zero, but it will grow in the second half of this year." Tether announced in January this year that it will launch USDT that supports the native Lightning Network. Changes may have begun since then. [PANews]

item.title: Ark Invest sold $12 million worth of Coinbase shares yesterdayJuly 25 news, according to CoinDesk, Cathie Wood's Ark Invest sold $12.00 million worth of Coinbase (COIN) shares on Thursday, continuing its trend of cashing out profits from Coinbase investments. Ark Invest sold a total of 30,501 Coinbase shares from its two funds. In addition, Ark Invest also sold 11,262 Robinhood (HOOD) shares, worth about $1.10 million; and sold 123,169 Block Inc (XYZ) shares, worth about $10.00 million, and 28,906 shares of its own Bitcoin ETF (ARKB), worth about $1.10 million. [PANews]

item.title: In the past 12 hours, 14,273 BTC suspected to be from a "Fossil Hand Whale" were recharged to major exchanges in batches by Galaxy Digital.On July 25, according to the monitoring of on-chain analyst @ai_9684xtpa, 14,273 BTC suspected to belong to the "14-year BTC holder" were recharged by Galaxy Digital in batches to major exchanges (about 1.67 billion US dollars) in the past 12 hours, of which 5,690 BTC were transferred in the past hour. Two sets of data show that this time there is a high probability that they are really selling: Binance BTC spot trading has traded more than 10,000 in 4 hours; Galaxy Digital has withdrawn some USDT from the exchange after recharging BTC. At noon today, Galaxy has withdrawn 200.00 million USDT from Binance and OKX, and then distributed 140.00 million of them to 5 new addresses. It should be that some of them are being sold and sorted out. At present, Galaxy still holds 33,763 BTC (about 3.90 billion US dollars) on the chain. Subsequently, the analyst released an update saying that the seven new addresses that received USDT should be Coinbase recharge addresses, and a total of 200.00 million USDT tokens have been recharged into hot wallets. It seems that the “Fossil Hand Whale” has chosen to settle at Coinbase. [PANews]

item.title:
Hong Kong’s OSL Group secures $300 million in equity funding to fuel global expansionHong Kong-based OSL Group has secured $300.00 million in equity financing to support its global expansion.
In a filing with the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, OSL said that it has entered into an equity purchase agreement to raise approximately HK$2,355.00 million ($300.00 million).
The company said it plans to use the proceeds to fuel global expansion through strategic acquisitions. OSL also intends to use the newly raised capital for the development of payment initiatives that integrate fiat currencies, stablecoins, and major cryptocurrencies.
"This $300.00 million equity raise marks a major milestone in our journey and reflects strong conviction in OSL’s digital asset strategy and execution," said Ivan Wong, chief financial officer of OSL Group. "The funding will accelerate our global buildout — particularly in regulated payment infrastructure and access points."
OSL's latest funding move comes as Hong Kong's new stablecoin licensing regime is expected to take effect on Aug. 1. The upcoming framework mandates licensing from the Hong Kong Monetary Authority for issuers of fiat-referenced stablecoins.
Global expansion appears to be at the forefront of OSL's agenda. Last month, OSL announced a $15.00 million deal to acquire Evergreen Crest, the operator of a cryptocurrency exchange in Indonesia. In February, the company completed its acquisition of the Japanese crypto exchange CoinBest and renamed it OSL Japan.
OSL's stock fell 7.40% in Hong Kongas of Friday, according to Yahoo Financedata, with the market still open. The stock, however, has risen 14.00% over the past month and 104.00% year-to-date.

item.title: WOO X: The attack was caused by a phishing attack on a team member's device, which gave the attacker access to the development environmentOn July 25, cryptocurrency trading platform WOO X released an update on the X platform saying that the attack originated from a team member's device being hacked in a targeted phishing attack, allowing the attacker to access the development environment. Although multiple security measures restricted access rights, it still gave the attacker time to coordinate a series of withdrawal operations from the user account mentioned in the previous message. The team is conducting a comprehensive forensic review and is prioritizing the reopening of withdrawal services for all users. Once the relevant work is completed, the progress will be updated here immediately. Previously, WOO X said that the attack has caused a loss of $14.00 million and promised to fully compensate the affected users. [PANews]

item.title: Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a total net inflow of 226.61M USD yesterday, with none of the twelve ETFs experiencing a net outflowAccording to SoSoValue data, Bitcoin spot ETF saw a total net inflow of 226.61M USD yesterday (Eastern Time, July 24th).The Bitcoin Spot ETF with the highest net inflow yesterday was Fidelity's ETF FBTC, with a daily net inflow of 106.58M USD, and the total historical net inflow of FBTC currently stands at 12.43B USD.The second highest was VanEck's ETF HODL, with a daily net inflow of 46.36M USD, and the total historical net inflow of HODL currently stands at 1.12B USD.As of the time of publication, the total net asset value of Bitcoin Spot ETFs is 154.45B USD, with an ETF net asset ratio (market capitalization relative to the total Bitcoin market cap) of 6.54%. The historical cumulative net inflow has reached 54.69B USD.Source: https://sosovalue.com/zh/assets/etf/us-btc-spot
